services.title: Primary Care Services
services.description: Comprehensive health assessments and preventive screenings to detect potential issues early and maintain optimal health

services.title: Specialized Health Screenings
services.description: Targeted diagnostic examinations focusing on early detection of specific diseases and conditions in high-risk populations

services.title: Reproductive and Family Health
services.description: Complete healthcare services supporting fertility, pregnancy, family planning decisions, and maternal-child wellness throughout all life stages

services.title: Occupational Health Services
services.description: Professional medical evaluations ensuring workplace safety compliance and fitness for duty in specialized employment sectors
features: Income Checks for GDL, PSV, and E-hailing

services.title: Surgical Services
services.description: Minor outpatient surgical procedures performed with precision and safety protocols for optimal patient outcomes and recovery

services.title: Travel Health Services
services.description: Specialized medical examinations and vaccinations required for international travel and religious pilgrimage
